description: Creates a portfolio. A delegated admin is authorized to invoke this command.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

parameters.name: DisplayName
parameters.description: The name to use for display purposes.

parameters.name: ProviderName
parameters.description: The name of the portfolio provider.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: One or more tags. (dict) --- Information about a tag. A tag is a key-value pair. Tags are propagated to the resources created when provisioning a product. The tag key. The value for this key.

parameters.name: IdempotencyToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier that you provide to ensure idempotency. If multiple requests differ only by the idempotency token, the same response is returned for each repeated request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The ARN assigned to the portfolio.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The name to use for display purposes.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The UTC time stamp of the creation time.

nested_items.name: ProviderName
nested_items.description: The name of the portfolio provider.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Information about the tags associated with the portfolio.
